Portfolio / Al Jazira Bank
Banking & Finance 2024

Al Jazira Bank Shariah Banking Launch

A New Leading Light in Innovative Islamic Banking.

Scroll to explore

Client

Al Jazira Bank

Industry

Banking & Finance

Services

Brand Repositioning, Multichannel Campaign

Year

2024

Project Overview

One of my most personally fulfilling campaignsâ€”a rare blend of deep cultural roots and contemporary storytelling, delivered with impact. This campaign helped the financial institution modernize its voice without losing cultural credibility, connecting emotionally to simplify services and build lasting trust

The Challenge

01

The core challenge was to launch Bank Aljazira's Islamic banking identity in a modern, emotional, and culturally resonant way. The goal was to move beyond traditional financial messaging and build genuine emotional bridges between faith, finance, and the everyday lives of customers.

The Creative Solution

02

The creative solution was built around the powerful concept of 'Light shining from afar,' symbolizing the rebirth of Islamic values in a modern context.

This idea was brought to life through a multichannel rollout that included print, video, digital, and corporate storytelling. The campaign successfully repositioned Al Jazira as a modern, Shariah-compliant banking leader..

Campaign in Action
